definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
Leslie Cheung (1956-2003), Hong Kong singer and actor
Rong Yiren (1916-2005), PRC Vice President from 1993-1998, played an important role in opening Chinese economy to Western investors

sentences.english: People in Wuhan are proud of the Yellow Crane Tower.
The exclusive store prided itself on its carriage trade .
sentences.chinese: 這家高級商店以主顧富有爲榮。

sentences.english: Martians pride themseles in doing things all by themseles.
sentences.chinese: 火星人以自力做事爲榮。

sentences.english: Honor he dating yourself by email misunderstanding, arrived at the restaurant, but only to appear.
sentences.chinese: 榮誤會玥以電郵約會自己，到達餐廳卻只見斯出現。

sentences.english: Ron found it difficult to determine the reasons for these events.
sentences.chinese: 榮發現他難以解釋出這些事情的原因。

sentences.english: A man is honored in his sons, and Jesus hath His quiver full of these arrows of the mighty.
sentences.chinese: 人以他的兒女爲榮，耶穌也以祂滿囊的箭袋爲榮。

sentences.english: A man is honored in his sons, and Jesus hath His quiver full of these arrows of the mighty.
sentences.chinese: 人以他的兒女爲榮，耶穌也以祂滿囊的箭袋爲榮。

sentences.english: I’m truly proud working for Nedbank.
sentences.chinese: 我着實以在南非萊利銀行工作爲榮。

sentences.english: All he saw honor send home namely faces, unknown so honor.
sentences.chinese: 全見榮送玥回家即破口大罵，榮不明所以。

sentences.english: Team work as glory, Mutual hurt as shame.
sentences.chinese: 以團結協作爲榮，以彼此拆臺爲恥。

sentences.english: After know earth required to return to glory.
sentences.chinese: 榮知道後要求返回凡間。

sentences.english: All the students should be proud of their school and not do things that endanger the school's reputation.
sentences.chinese: 任何學生都應該以學校爲榮，不做影響校譽的事。

sentences.english: And I took my staff, even Beauty, and cut it asunder, that I might break my covenant which I had made with all the people.
sentences.chinese: 我折斷那稱爲榮美的杖，表明我廢棄與萬民所立的約。

sentences.english: The pragmatist mayors pride themselves on being result-oriented.
sentences.chinese: 這些講究實用的市長們以恪守“效果至上”爲榮。

sentences.english: Live plainly, struggle hard, do not wallow in luxuries and pleasures.
sentences.chinese: 以艱苦奮鬥爲榮，以嬌奢淫逸爲恥。

definition: surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
